actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1978, 1979, and 1980 to carry out State cooperative programs under the Endangered Species Act of 1973.

summary.text: Amends the Endangered Species Act of 1973 to authorize the appropriation of funds not to exceed $3,000,000 per year for the fiscal years 1978, 1979, and 1980 for State cooperative programs.

titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1978, 1979, and 1980 to carry out State cooperative programs under the Endangered Species Act of 1973.
